entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
